dcterms:description: The CamVid dataset consists of 367 training, 233 testing, and 101 validation fully annotated frames, each frame being 360 Ã— 480 pixels. It is used for evaluating semantic segmentation performance.

dcterms:description: The Carla dataset is a simulated dataset for self-driving cars, containing 4550 training images and 449 testing images. It has 13 classes for pixel classification and is used for semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Carla
